title: Receipt
description: A receipt representation within the wunderbon domain.

merchant.description: The Id of the issuer (Merchant). Each Merchant will recive an unique User-Id.

location.description: The Id of the location. Each location (branch) of a Merchant has its own Id.

pos.description: The Id of the PoS. Each PoS within at the location (branch) has its own Id.

cart.description: The cart contains a collection of cartItems (representation of a product, merchant added information and the pricing).

payment.description: Payment part of the receipt. This node contains information on how the amount of the cart was settled.

footer.description: Footer lines to be printed on bottom of receipt. Often used to print information about special deals or a new website.
